sentence: The image is an Avon advertisement.
On the left side, there is a close-up of a person with light blonde hair styled away from the face, wearing a black and white top.
sentence_cn: 左侧有一个特写镜头，一个人的浅金色头发远离脸部，身穿黑白色上衣。

sentence: They are smiling with bright red lipstick.
sentence_cn: 她们涂着鲜红的口红，笑容满面。

sentence: There is text in the top left corner: "Linda Montavon, Avon Representative since 1997."
sentence_cn: 左上角有文字：“琳达·蒙塔冯 (Linda Montavon)，自 1997 年起担任雅芳代表。”

sentence: Below, there's a QR code with the message: ¡°Learn how Linda creates a more beautiful world.
sentence_cn: 下面有一个二维码，上面写着：“了解琳达如何创造一个更美好的世界。”

sentence: On the right side of the image, there is a bold pink background with white, handwritten-style text reading: "Always be your beautiful self."
sentence_cn: 图片右侧是鲜艳的粉色背景，上面有白色的手写文字：“永远做美丽的自己。”

sentence: Below this text is the phrase: "Beauty for a Purpose AVON" in black and white.
sentence_cn: 这段文字下方是黑白两色的短语：“Beauty for a Purpose AVON”。
